name: .NTX File Extension
type_name: theWord Encrypted New Testament Text Module
summary: Learn about .NTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by theWord Bible software; contains a copy of the New Testament and incorporates encryption, unlike the plain text formatting used by theWord's .NT format; helps distribution by protecting digital copies of the New Testament.

content: NTX files are often downloaded as ".ntx.exe" files that install the New Testament copy when opened.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
